Description: Please READ entire ad, see pics for condition, and ask ALL questions BEFORE purchase! Thanks! Selling my monstrous 2012 ESP LTD GL-200K George Lynch Signature guitar with an outrageous "Kamikaze" finish. Best of all, this guitar was autographed by the man himself on the back of the headstock. While I can't prove the autograph is real, a quick search will show dozens of the exact same signature. The ESP LTD GL-200K guitar that features a basswood body, maple neck with a 22 fret rosewood board, hot ESP-designed LH-150B humbucker in the bridge and an ESP-designed LS-120N single-coil in the neck and a Floyd Rose Special Tremolo system with whammy bar. My guitar is in decent shape with some chips around the edges, one on the top, and some scratches here and there. No back plate. Includes a lame gig bag. This guitar is an ESP factory second and has been stamped "2" on the back of the headstock. Please don't hesitate to ask any and all questions that you may have or for more pictures BEFORE you buy and I will get back to you immediately. There are absolutely no refunds on this guitar, so please be sure of your purchase before you Buy Now or make an offer. Guitar will be shipped fully insured and packed like a beast. Thanks for reading and good luck! *****For my international customers: I ship almost anywhere in the world! Because this guitar contains rosewood, it is subject to strict CITES regulations for export. I am Colorado's only private CITES certified seller! CITES paperwork can take up to 30 days for approval BEFORE the item can ship. Buyer is responsible for all shipping, customs, and CITES associated fees. PLEASE CONTACT ME PRIOR TO MAKING AN OFFER OR BUYING.
